attributes.action: Change the 'London 2012' Olympic Logo, As it is an Embarrassment to our countries image
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the release of the official 'London 2012'Olympic Logo (4th June 2007) we petition the Prime Minister to change the logo, as an overwhelming majority of the public feel embarrassed by the way it portrays our country & capital.
(http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/other_sports/olympics_2012/6718243.stm)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
